title: Resume
description: Serves as a way to easily edit the resume on the portfolio without editing the HTML content

highlights.description: A list of 3 highlights that are seen at the top of the resume page

skills.description: Represents the skills shown on the resume

education.description: Represents the education on the resume

experience.description: Represents the Job Experience shown on the resume

highlightItem.description: Defines one of the three "highlights" on top of the resume page

icon.description: The icon used for this highlight. See https://www.nerdfonts.com/cheat-sheet for a list of available symbols

stat.description: The statistic used for the highlight

statDescription.description: A description for the statistic in the highlight

highSkill.description: List of skills withing the category with advanced knowledge

medSkill.description: List of skills withing the category with intermediate knowledge

lowSkill.description: List of skills withing the category with beginner knowledge

eduExperience.description: Represents education section of a resume

graduationDate.description: Graduation date for this institution. Appears as a subtitle to the accordion card

degree.description: The degree(s) and graduation class of the insitution/school

degreeAddendum.description: Any other relevant information about your degree (i.e. Major change, adding minors, etc)

relCoursework.description: The list of completed courses that may be relevant to employers

propCoursework.description: The list of current/future courses that may be relevant to employers

profExperience.description: This is an entry for profesional experience (e.g. a job/internship)

timeEmployed.description: String detailing length of time employed. Best formatted as <Month><Year> - (<Month><Year> OR 'Present')

location.description: Location of the professional experience, is optional

terminationReason.description: If applicable, adds a reason why you are no longer employed. This field is not required

responsibilities.description: A list of strings that represent the responsibilities you held at this employer

gpa.description: Holds information about GPA. Excluding this field will not show any GPA information under this education section

unweighted.description: Holds an Unweighted GPA value (Validates from 0.0 to 4.0)

weighted.description: Holds a weighted GPA value (Validates from 0.0 to 5.0
